<table border="0" width="100%"> <tbody> <tr> <td align="center" rowspan="2" valign="top"> <a href="index.html"><img border="0" alt="Triangle With Vertex Numbers" title="Triangle With Vertex Numbers" hspace="10" src="TriangleWithNumbers.png" width="140" height="143" align="middle"/></a> </td> <td align="left"> This chapter illustrates design patterns and best practices for authoring different geometries through a collection of interesting 3D shapes. The open-source <a href="http://meshlab.sourceforge.net" target="_blank">Meshlab</a> and <a href="https://savage.nps.edu/X3D-Edit" target="_blank">X3D-Edit</a> authoring tools helped create many of these examples.
